origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'EconomicAPI.analyze_investment_trends', 'description': 'This function analyzes investment trends in a specific sector over a given time frame.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'sector', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The sector to analyze, e.g., infrastructure, technology.'}, {'name': 'timeFrame', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The time frame for the analysis, e.g., lastYear, lastFiveYears.'}, {'name': 'dataPoints', 'type': 'LIST', 'description': 'A list of data points to include in the analysis, e.g., investmentVolume, projectCount.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'trendAnalysis', 'description': 'The analysis of investment trends in the specified sector over the given time frame.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 EconomicAPI.analyze_investment_trends, 它的参数输入如下: 'sector'是'infrastructure', 'timeFrame'是'lastYear', 'dataPoints'是['investmentVolume', 'projectCount'].
